--- braced_new_constructor_empty.sql
NEW Universe {}
--- AST
&ast.BracedNewConstructor{
  Type: &ast.NamedType{
    Path: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 4,
        NameEnd: 12,
        Name: "Universe",
      },
    },
  },
  Body: &ast.BracedConstructor{
    Lbrace: 13,
    Rbrace: 14,
  },
}

--- SQL
NEW Universe {}
